meanings.definition: A pivoted bar engaging with the teeth of a wheel or rack, used to prevent backward movement.
meanings.sent1: The pawl clicked into place, stopping the wheel from turning back.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic adjusted the pawl to ensure the wheel stayed in position.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel thought the pawl was a tiny seesaw.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a pawl, locking her in place and not letting her go back.
meanings.sent5: The pawl acted like a gatekeeper, refusing any backward motion of the wheel.

meanings.definition: A hinged catch that fits into a notch of a ratchet to move it in one direction only.
meanings.sent1: With a satisfying click, the pawl secured the ratchet in place.
meanings.sent2: The pawl smoothly guided the ratchet in the desired direction.
meanings.sent3: The pawl felt like a secret agent, allowing movement in one direction only.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as a pawl, steering the conversation in one direction.
meanings.sent5: The pawl was like a traffic cop, directing the ratchet's movement with precision.
